overview: So far he has earned his living as deputy editor-in-chief at the Grevenbroicher Tagblatt, but actually Horst Schl채mmer had always guessed: he was destined for something bigger - too much bigger. Without further ado, he therefore quits his old job, founds his very own party and thus starts his rush to the chancellor's office. While the election machinery is quickly started and soon picks up speed, only two questions remain unanswered: Is Horst Schl채mmer ready for Germany? And is Germany ready for him?
title: Horst Schl채mmer - Isch kandidiere!
